Package com.github.sbaudoin.yamllint

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Parser.Lined
    All classes that implement this interface can expose a line number
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Cli
    Main class to run YAML Lint as a command line tool
    Format
    Helper class to format the output of this linter
    Linter
    Main linter class
    LintProblem
    Represents a linting problem found by yamllint.
    LintScanner
    Is a wrapper to org.yaml.snakeyaml.scanner.ScannerImpl for easing the handling of some java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException that can occur with peekToken() and getToken() when there is no more tokens to get.
    LintStreamReader
    StreamReader intended to replace SnakeYAML's standard class for loading the whole content in memory.
    Parser
    Main YAMLLint parser utility class.
    Parser.Comment
    Simple wrapper class for comments: a YAML comment start with a # character, is located on a line and starts at a given column number on this line.
    Parser.Line
    Simple wrapper class for lines: a line is contained within a given string (the boundaries are given by start and end) and has a line number
    Parser.Token
    Simple wrapper class for token: a token is found on a line and has neighbour tokens
    YamlLintConfig  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    YamlLintConfigException
